body: Hopefully you are not like that. Amen
I am disappointed neither the art nor the story was any good.
Kill all cucks and learn to tag idiots
nah,girl create a harem is impossible,after the girl been used up gaping and broken,man will dump her..
this anime is garbage but the doujin is pretty good
There is a difference, hating vanillafags is a reaction. It wouldn't exist if they weren't so obnoxious in every ntr comment section.

i dont understand why people call this cucked or ntr. it isnt. she wasnt in a relationship with kirito. never has been and never will. she loved him which was poor writing of course. sao is a landfill of poor writing. but the people who say kill all cucks and all that dont really understand what cuck or ntr mean.
also all the people who say stuff like let the vanilla fags rage and all that make me laugh. they are so caught up in insulting them they dont realize that they are the same. while people who like vanilla doujin get mad at ntr doujin your getting mad or insulting those people. no difference. just funny to watch how blind the hypocrisy is tbh.
This one was less satisfying than the Other waterwheel Suguha after all those she was just fulfilling her desire for Kirito but in this she’s made a sex slave

@Reverie01 PREACH!!! Sad thing was when these anime first started, I’d say the first 13 episodes of SAO and the first two season lad of fairy tail things just gradually got lazy. It’s sad how writers come come so strong but get lazy in the end, that’s why I prefer a anime/manga end early than watch it turn into a “living dead” figuratively speaking.....
And just like with Fairy Tail, the only good thing about SAO is its inspiration for doujins.
Kirito is definitely not a virgin, is just that Suguha can no longer fuck him. Since his dick is already a property of Asuna Yuuki.
